import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-forgot-password', templateUrl: './forgot-password.page.html', styleUrls: ['./forgot-password.page.scss'], }) export class ForgotPasswordPage implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } } forgotPassword
Email Errors appear instantly! Please enter a valid email address Email is required
